component.text: Sent with highest preferential treatment, such as replies to an instant message about plans for the weekend that should be decided immediately.
Sent with some preferential treatment, such as a response to a text message for coordinating a group homework project that is due in three days.
Sent with regular treatment, such as responding to a voice message from a parent about a potential present for a birthday party next week for a friend.
Sent with best effort means, such as responding to an e-mail request from a brother about lending camping supplies for a trip in a few weeks.
